project.description: Just a utility, not part of the major steps.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### start main program ===================================
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
## works per taxon OK php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children","sciname":"Gadus","tc_id":46564414}' #php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children","sciname":"Gadidae","tc_id":5503}' #php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children","sciname":"Gadiformes","tc_id":5496}'
## taxon with many many children OK #php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children","sciname":"Noctuidae","tc_id":873}' #php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children","sciname":"Saurischia","tc_id":4531095}'
## development only OK --- NOT to run in eol-archive #php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"gen_map_data_forTaxa_with_children"}'
